import React, { useState } from 'react'; import TickerSearchComp from '../tickerSearchComp'; function PricingStratagyCard() { var Today = new Date(); let year = Today.getFullYear() const [ticker, setTicker] = useState("") const [inputError, setInputError] = useState(false); const [startYear, setStartYear] = useState(10); const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(""); const [condition, setCondition] = useState("便宜價"); const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const conditionSwitch = [ ["cheap", "便宜價"], ["reasonable", "合理價"], ["expensive", "昂貴價"] ] return ( <>
setEndDate(e.target.value)} min = { year.toString() + "-" + (Today.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0') + "-" + Today.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0') }>
{ inputError ?

股票代號&名稱或訂閱到期日格式錯誤

: <> }
) } export default PricingStratagyCard;
